programme.title: Robert Bork’s Supreme Court nomination
programme.short_synopsis: President Reagan's controversial nomination of Judge Robert Bork to the Supreme Court.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Reagan's nomination of conservative Judge Robert Bork to the Supreme Court, the highest power in the US, has alarmed liberals and heartened far-right Republicans.
